profile_summary: Edge AI engineer with 9 years developing embedded ML solutions for real-time industrial automation systems. Skilled in model quantization and deployment on resource-constrained hardware.

experience.title: Edge AI Engineer, SmartLine AG; Stuttgart, Germany — 2017–Present
